item.title: A Lady Deserving of True Love
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Mariz has always been an ‘all-out love giver’ despite everything she’s been through. Her previous love interests may have given her a sense of belonging, but most were short-lived. She was broken—multiple times, but her heart and soul remains strong. She has never failed to give her best: (1) care and concern; (2) knowledge and wisdom; (3) time and effort; (4) love and affection. On your 21st birthday, here is my wish for you: TRUE AND EVERLASTING LOVE <3
item.content:encoded:
Mariz has always been an ‘all-out love giver’ despite everything she’s been through. Her previous love interests may have given her a sense of belonging, but most were short-lived. She was broken—multiple times, but her heart and soul remains strong.

She has never failed to give her best: (1) care and concern; (2) knowledge and wisdom; (3) time and effort; (4) love and affection.

On your 21st birthday, here is my wish for you: TRUE AND EVERLASTING LOVE <3

item.title: With a Mindblowing Smile
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Such a unique and contagious smile. Her smile gives me hope and resiliency. Mariz is not your ordinary girl. Though it may not show at first, she’s been through a lot of tough times. But her smile is unaltered; still strong and bright. It serves as an inspiration to continue with life despite all its hardships, for these challenges are what makes us strong—just as how Mariz became one. For your 21st birthday, my wish is for you to always have this smile.
item.content:encoded:
Such a unique and contagious smile. Her smile gives me hope and resiliency. Mariz is not your ordinary girl. Though it may not show at first, she’s been through a lot of tough times. But her smile is unaltered; still strong and bright. It serves as an inspiration to continue with life despite all its hardships, for these challenges are what makes us strong—just as how Mariz became one.

For your 21st birthday, my wish is for you to always have this smile.

item.title: And a Heart Full of Love
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Mariz is a person full of compassion and affection. She’s always there for her family and friends; sometimes even strangers. Truly, a servant of God who lives up the values taught to us by Jesus Christ. Wishing your heart to be filled with more love on this special day of yours.
item.content:encoded:
Mariz is a person full of compassion and affection. She’s always there for her family and friends; sometimes even strangers. Truly, a servant of God who lives up the values taught to us by Jesus Christ.

Wishing your heart to be filled with more love on this special day of yours.

item.title: Eager for New Things
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Mariz is an open-minded person. She’s always eager to learn new things. She’s consistent with improving herself and helping others along the way. She’s willing to make time for things that matter despite her busy schedule. I’m wishing you more strength and courage to continue pursuing this endeavor of yours.
item.content:encoded:
Mariz is an open-minded person. She’s always eager to learn new things. She’s consistent with improving herself and helping others along the way. She’s willing to make time for things that matter despite her busy schedule.

I’m wishing you more strength and courage to continue pursuing this endeavor of yours.

item.title: Making Every Moment Special
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: A special kind of woman is a woman who makes even the simplest moments special in her own ways. Her prowess of humor and dedication to making the most out of everything is what sets her apart from everyone. As this special day comes, I wish that Mariz will always have this ability and let her enjoy every moment she makes special.
item.content:encoded:
A special kind of woman is a woman who makes even the simplest moments special in her own ways. Her prowess of humor and dedication to making the most out of everything is what sets her apart from everyone.

As this special day comes, I wish that Mariz will always have this ability and let her enjoy every moment she makes special.

item.title: Beauty in All Aspect
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Mariz is a fine and beautiful lady. She looks charming in every possible angle. Her gorgeous smile even makes every picture of her perfect. Those dazzling eyes, fluffy cheeks, rich hair, straight and delicate nose, soft ears, rosy moist lips, and bright exotic skin. To top all of that, it’s her inner beauty that stands out the most. Her kindness and thoughtfulness. Her generosity and compassion. Her empathy and understanding. Her helpfulness and willingness. Those are the qualities that makes Mariz the best of herself. I’m wishing her for more…
item.content:encoded:
Mariz is a fine and beautiful lady. She looks charming in every possible angle. Her gorgeous smile even makes every picture of her perfect. Those dazzling eyes, fluffy cheeks, rich hair, straight and delicate nose, soft ears, rosy moist lips, and bright exotic skin. To top all of that, it’s her inner beauty that stands out the most. Her kindness and thoughtfulness. Her generosity and compassion. Her empathy and understanding. Her helpfulness and willingness. Those are the qualities that makes Mariz the best of herself.

I’m wishing her for more appreciation from the people closest to her. Hopefully she gets the same magnitude of cherishing from the people she cares the most as I give her in this post.

item.title: God’s Princess
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Mariz is a true servant of God. Her life mission is to spread to everyone the love of God. She brings hope to every person in need of it. She gives meaning to every struggle. She never fails in glorifying and thanking Him for the blessings she receives. She helps every person she recognizes to know Jesus by heart. May she continue to serve Him through the help of His grace. May she fulfill her purpose in life and forever give joy to our Creator.
item.content:encoded:
Mariz is a true servant of God. Her life mission is to spread to everyone the love of God. She brings hope to every person in need of it. She gives meaning to every struggle. She never fails in glorifying and thanking Him for the blessings she receives. She helps every person she recognizes to know Jesus by heart.

May she continue to serve Him through the help of His grace. May she fulfill her purpose in life and forever give joy to our Creator.

item.title: Pure-Hearted
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Mariz is truly a pure-hearted and honest person. She freely expresses herself. She hold no grudges against others. Every goodwill she commits is a true expression of her kindness.
item.content:encoded: Mariz is truly a pure-hearted and honest person. She freely expresses herself. She hold no grudges against others. Every goodwill she commits is a true expression of her kindness.

item.title: Outstanding Personality
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Mariz is the type of person who doesn’t always want to be in the spotlight; although, when she does, it’s completely effortless and natural. You know she’s right when she’s right. She’s a person who will always stand for what’s right and will defend her loved ones from all the negativity lurking around.
item.content:encoded: Mariz is the type of person who doesn’t always want to be in the spotlight; although, when she does, it’s completely effortless and natural. You know she’s right when she’s right. She’s a person who will always stand for what’s right and will defend her loved ones from all the negativity lurking around.

item.title: Someone Who Knows How You Feel
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Mariz is a woman of empathy and compassion. She knows when you’re going through something and she’ll always be there for you no matter what.
item.content:encoded: Mariz is a woman of empathy and compassion. She knows when you’re going through something and she’ll always be there for you no matter what.
